item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Procedural Knowledge in Pretraining Drives Reasoning in Large Language Models (73 points | 3 comments)

8. Kyawthuite is so rare it's only ever been found once (142 points | 43 comments)
